name: Conversion Perk
description:
We are a team of digital marketing experts all set to take your business goals to the next level. We are driven by the passion to position our customers in a place where we can ceaselessly work towards boosting revenue, driving sales and thriving for better results every day. We promise no quick results and project nothing unachievable.
We are the expert digital marketing team players powered by experience and passion and we promise to always keep you ahead of others with our advanced digital sense.
We have built a unique marketing strategy (with the perfect combination of different marketing platforms) to meet business needs & market conditions. We provide up-to-date, Pay Per Click services that include all aspects of PPC; like market research to competitors' research and audience estimation to conversion estimation. We have taken the branch of PPC to new heights where each and every segment of the digital platform is covered.
We can help you to run the most efficient Google Adwords Search Campaigns, YouTube Video Campaigns, Amazon Marketing Campaigns, Display Network Campaigns, Google Shopping Campaigns, Universal App Install Campaigns, Facebook Ads Campaigns (For Website conversions, app installs, website clicks, leads, page likes, post engagements, video views or app engagement campaign), Bing Ads Campaigns, Twitter Ads Campaigns (For Followers, Website Clicks, Website Conversions, Re-tweets etc.) and LinkedIn Ads Campaigns.
